level.heading: Temporary personnel and procurement authority.
level.text: Effective until October 1, 2009, the Department shall exercise:

Personnel authority to hire, retain, and terminate personnel as appropriate to perform the functions of the Department consistent with Chapter 6 of Title 1, including establishing compensation and reimbursement consistent with the District's wage grade and non-wage grade schedules and the Congressionally approved budget; and
Procurement authority independent of the Office of Contracting and Procurement, consistent with Chapter 3A of Title 2; except, that § 2- 352.01(a) shall not apply.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 19-171, in par. (2), substituted "consistent with Chapter 3A of Title 2; except, that § 2-352.01(a) shall not apply" for "consistent with unit A of Chapter 3 of Title 2; except with regard to the powers and duties set forth in § 2-301.05(a), (b), (c), and (e)".

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-171, see notes under § 7-242.
